patthana17.27:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo
patthana17.27:1.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana17.27:1.1_2: nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana17.27:1.1_3: nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana17.27:1.1_4: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana17.27:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naakusalo dhammo
patthana17.27:2.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana17.27:2.1_2: nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana17.27:2.1_3: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naakusalo ca dhammā
patthana17.27:2.1_4: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha
patthana17.27:3.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naabyākato
patthana17.27:3.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana17.27:3.1_2: naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā
patthana17.27:3.1_3: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naabyākato ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naabyākato ca dhammā
patthana17.27:3.1_4: uppajjanti hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
